description: The test, the third of a fully assembled Starship and booster, could happen as soon as Thursday.
title: The FAA grants SpaceX a license ahead of third Starship launch attempt

description: The report was done with the cooperation of TikTok, which granted its authors access to information on the site.
title: TikTok’s contribution to the economy is huge, new report asserts

description: While proponents of the bill insisted during the debate that it doesn’t ban TikTok, few creators or advocates accepted that assurance at face value.
title: TikTok creators say House bill’s passage threatens lives and livelihoods

description: The House offensive materialized abruptly, after years of efforts to force TikTok to split from its China-based parent, ByteDance, or face a national ban.
title: House passes TikTok crackdown that could ban app in U.S.

description: The vote, to require TikTok’s Chinese owner to sell it or face a U.S. ban, is expected to pass the House overwhelmingly, but its fate in the Senate is uncertain.
title: Live updates: House to vote on bill that could lead to TikTok ban

description: A global network of online groups has targeted thousands of children with a sadistic form of social media terror that authorities and technology companies have struggled to control, an examination finds.
title: On popular online platforms, predatory groups coerce children into self-harm

description: Nearly a decade ago, Congress passed a law that allows private American space companies the rights to resources they mine on celestial bodies, including the moon.. Now a company has said it wants to take advantage of that law.
title: This company intends to be the first to mine the moon

description: Nearly a decade ago, Congress passed a law that allows private American space companies the rights to resources they mine on celestial bodies, including the moon.. Now a company has said it wants to take advantage of that law.
title: This company intends to be the first to mine the moon

description: In the seven years since TikTok was born as a lip-syncing app for Chinese teens, the platform has reshaped the media landscape — forcing U.S. tech giants to reckon with a foreign rival.
title: How TikTok went from teen sensation to political pariah

description: After one man loses control of his social media account, one of his acquaintances gets bilked out of $5,000.
title: How two smart people fell for a classic Facebook scam
